name: Polarity Puzzles
description: Hello, I'm a 16 year old game developer from the US, I worked with a great sound designer (who you can find here - https://www.instagram.com/eddbeatmusic_ https://twitter.com/eddbeatmusic https://soundcloud.com/eddbeatmusic) I didn't understand the phrase "Sleep Deprived" until I opened a new unity project for this jam XD, I hope you enjoy playing my game.
